sentences.english: Opening the door in an emergency will automatically  inflate the evacuation slides.
sentences.chinese: 打开紧急出口的门会自动充气逃离滑梯。

sentences.english: Using the rope as a slide, Chien-Po helped the Emperor to safety.
sentences.chinese: 他们永绳索做了一个滑梯，把皇帝救到安全的地方。

sentences.english: There was only a slide before.
He said Britain was in a "spiral" and it is difficult to argue with him.
sentences.chinese: 他称英国为一个“滑梯”，而且很难吵过他。

sentences.english: The children were taking turns on the slides in the playground.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在操场上轮流滑滑梯。
美洲獾会被卡在溜滑梯吗？

sentences.english: Sell inflatable arch, model, bouncer, slide, castle, cartoon toy.
sentences.chinese: 销售充气拱门，模型，保镖，滑梯，城堡，卡通玩具。

sentences.english: I like playing on the slide.
At first Ni-Ni complained that the slides were too hot and no fun.
sentences.chinese: 妮子一开始说溜滑梯都太热不好玩。

sentences.english: Millie has moved on to the climbing frame now. She has mastered this over the months.
sentences.chinese: 米莉去爬滑梯，几个月中她已熟练掌握它了。

sentences.english: Sandra:It was a slide so that President Chiang Kai-shek could quickly escape.
sentences.chinese: 它就是为了让蒋中正总统快速逃离的溜滑梯啊。

sentences.english: Allen would never even try to slide.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦甚至从不试着去滑滑梯。

sentences.english: He is sliding down the slide on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 他正在操场上玩滑滑梯。

sentences.english: Children will love riding the inclinator from the clifftop pool to the sand below.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们可以乘着滑梯从悬崖顶部游泳池滑向底部沙滩。

sentences.english: I always play on the swing and the slide in my garden.
sentences.chinese: 我总是在花园里面荡秋千，滑滑梯。

definition: merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
swing (seat hung from a frame or branch)
sandpit (for children's play or for long jump etc)/sandbox
to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
